summary: A three room house mod that with plenty of storage and its own armory!
descriptionHtml:
Zeye\'s Wondrous Mod of a basement-like House!
[img] http://s11.postimg.org/86x07htkz/description_dash.png [/img]
This house contains:
  -Mannequins
  -Display Cases
  -Tables
  -A Bed
  -An Armory
  -1 Shrine to Talos
  -1 Shrine to Julianos (or whatever dat magicka guy is called)
  -1 Alchemy Station
  -1 Enchanting Station
  -3 Separate Rooms
  -A Kick-Ass Bookshelf
  -A Closet-of-Many-Uses (CMU)
  -A Chair or Two
  -Food Crates
  -Complete Crafting Area
  -Probably Some More Ish I Forgot

So download this stupid mod and travel north...ish out of Whiterun and snag a base today! (Base is automatically marked [but not discovered] in map on start up)

WARNING: Side-effects may include but are not limited to: Blue-Screens, over heating, motherboard meltin\', molestation, evil shrimp, implosive sneezes, \'the herps\', the clap, mild cases of death & disowning, and extreme cases of disappointment.




NOTE: This mod does NOT contain ponies, so it\'s friendly to those not liking MLP: FIM. Don\'t whine about it.
Hidden-Hideout & CMU are not trademarks of anything stop reading and freaking download this.
author: zeye
